name: text
message: What text would you like to appear on your logo?

name: textColor
message:
What color would you like your text to be? Hexidecimal values are accepted. 
(Note: You can't have the same color for your logo and your text):

name: shape
message: What type of logo would you like to create?

name: color
message:
What color would you like your logo to be? Hexidecimal values are accepted. 
(Note: You can't have the same color for your logo and your text):

name: size
message: What size would you like your logo to be?
